mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name, CASE WHEN tr_role.trans_text IS NULL THEN r.display_name ELSE tr_role.trans_text END role_display_name, CASE WHEN tr_org.trans_text IS NULL THEN org.name ELSE tr_org.trans_text END org_name FROM eh_role r JOIN eh_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN eh_organization org ON r.org_id = org.id LEFT JOIN eh_translation tr_org ON tr_org.table_name = 'eh_organization' AND tr_org.column_name = 'name' AND tr_org.trans_id = org.id AND tr_org.language_code = '${languageCode}' LEFT JOIN eh_translation tr_role ON tr_role.table_name = 'eh_role' AND tr_role.column_name = 'display_name' AND tr_role.trans_id = r.id AND tr_role.language_code = '${languageCode}' ${ew.customSqlSegment}
